events.message: Customer reported a rear-end collision involving their sedan that occured yesterday afternoon at an intersection.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing accident description and initial report details.
Assigned an agent specialized in auto claims to handle the accident case for faster processing and assistance.
Acknowledged receipt of claim to the claimant and assured them that the investigation process has started.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical records for injuries sustained in the accident.
Received all requested documents including accident report, car damage photos, and doctor's evaluation report.
Investigation team has begun detailed examination of accident circumstances and liability evidence.
Investigation concluded with clear determination of fault and extent of damages confirmed.
Proposed settlement amount was communicated to the claimant based on damage and injury assessment.
Claimant expressed satisfaction with the communication and transparency about the payout offer.
Claim officially approved for the full proposed settlement reflecting comprehensive coverage.
Settlement payment was processed and credited to the claimant’s bank account as per requested method.
The claim file was closed after confirming payment receipt and claimant’s acceptance of settlement terms.
The case documents and final reports were archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
